mapper.insert: insert into t02_cult_geograph ( geograph_id, module_id, index_title, index_content, img_path, index_state, pub_state, group_id order_by, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{geograph_id}, #{module_id}, #{index_title}, #{index_content}, #{img_path}, #{index_state}, #{pub_state}, #{group_id}, #{order_by}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update t02_cult_geograph set index_state=1 ,pub_state=1 ,cre_time=now() ,upd_time=now() where geograph_id = #{geograph_id}
mapper.select:
select e.*,o.function_name from t02_cult_geograph e left join t01_function_info o on e.module_id = o.module_id
order by e.index_title

select index_title as title,index_content as content,img_path as img_url,order_by from t02_cult_geograph where index_state=1 and pub_state=1 and group_id =1 union all select index_title as title,index_content as content,img_path as img_url,order_by from t02_his_cult where index_state=1 and pub_state=1 and group_id =1 order by order_by
